TextView.android:text:
This Section is used for Remembering/Revising things with the help of clues/hints which you've created earlier.

By clicking the ROLL button or on the content pallet, it starts showing random hints of that particular content.
Every click will give you a random hint. You need to remember the content behind it.

If the content has no Sequences, then you've to go back and edit the content and add Sequences.

After completion of one cycle of all hints, it will show a message to restart. 

You can restart by long press on ROLL button or on the content pallet.

To view the content/Summary/Answer linked with the hint, you need to press the VIEW CONTENT button.
